name: Reds vs Blues
description:
"Reds and Blues" in a consantration and strategy game. Player has to press blue and red buttons in a correct sequence for increasing the score. In order to do this, player shoud learn the rules, keep the necessary moves in mind and fully consantrate on the game. 

Note: World record for this game is 1024!

Good luck...

Game rules:

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1FBl0VGVZ3UW7wXpWGhiqLjM8MTsXcQa4/edit?usp=sh...
